div.h1: ONSITE SCHOOL POSTPONED THROUGH THE END OF THIS SCHOOL YEAR!

p.span: SACA IS THE KEY TO YOUR

div.p: SOUTHERN ARIZONA COMMUNITY ACADEMY (SACA) is a cutting-edge, tuition-free charter high school located in Arizona. SACA students have the option of studying on-site at our headquarters in Tucson, or attending SACA online from anywhere in the state. Online students also can come to campus for any

With a focus on developing students who are critical and creative thinkers who will be ready for a life of continued learning upon graduation, SACA provides a truly individualized education and curriculum with self-paced courses and flexible hours. The key component that sets SACA apart is our community. Our staff is a dedicated team working together to support each individual’s academic pursuits and their dreams well beyond a high school diploma. We also believe parents, grandparents and guardians are partners with us in each student’s growth and positive learning experience. As evidenced by our graduation ceremonies, these celebrations are such a personal tribute to each student who has achieved their goal of graduating from high school, now with a firm foundation, ready to soar to the next level of success.

SACA was chartered by the Arizona State Charter School Board in May 1999 as a public school. Further, SACA earned approval from the State to expand as an Online High School in 2014. Today, the Academy has succeeded as an alternative school whose mission is to prepare mature students academically as well as emotionally, with strength and fundamentals to carry with them their entire lives through.

span.span: Southern Arizona Community Academy is an alternative high school whose mission is to provide diverse, multifaceted opportunities for each of our students to engage in personalized learning experiences; thereby, preparing each student for success in his or her College/Post-secondary Education, Occupation/Career, and Life. Our purpose is to foster the student’s individual growth and achievement by using the SACA paradigm which has been designed specifically to meet the unique academic and personal needs of alternative students.

Southern Arizona Community Academy is an alternative high school whose mission is to provide diverse, multifaceted opportunities for each of our students to engage in personalized learning experiences; thereby, preparing each student for success in his or her College/Post-secondary Education, Occupation/Career, and Life. Our purpose is to foster the student’s individual growth and achievement by using the SACA paradigm which has been designed specifically to meet the unique academic and personal needs of alternative students.

Southern Arizona Community Academy Online is an alternative online high school whose mission is to provide diverse, multifaceted opportunities for each of our students to engage in personalized learning experiences; thereby, preparing each student for success in his or her College/Post-secondary Education, Occupation/Career, and Life. Our purpose is to foster the student’s individual growth and achievement by using the SACA online paradigm which has been designed specifically to meet the unique academic and personal needs of alternative students.
Thank you! We will be in touch soon!

div.p: LEARN ONLINE OR ONSITE | FLEXIBLE SCHEDULES | ENGAGING CURRICULUM | AWESOME CLUBS + ACTIVITIES |
ACTIVE DOG RESCUE STUDENT ORGANIZATION | COMPETITIVE SPORTS | INTERACTIVE FIELD TRIPS |
FREE BREAKFAST + LUNCH FOR ALL STUDENTS | FREE BUS PASSES | SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY | ACCELERATED |
CREDIT RECOVERY | DUAL CREDIT WITH PIMA COMMUNITY COLLEGE | SCIENCE OLYMPIAD | HEART |

p.span: Southern Arizona Community Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, genetic information or disability in admission or access to, or treatment or employment in, its educational programs or activities. Inquiries concerning Title VI, Title VII, Title IX, Section 504, and Americans With Disabilities Act may be referred to the Director, Abelardo Cubillas, Jr. or Principal, Larry Speta, 2470 North Tucson Boulevard, Tucson, AZ 85716,
